alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton; Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 18 at 7:31AM CDT until March 18 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN AUTAUGA...SOUTHWESTERN CHILTON AND NORTHEASTERN DALLAS COUNTIES... At 731 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Parnell, or 10 miles north of Valley Grande, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Valley Grande, Maplesville, Billingsley, Plecher, Vida Junction, Parnell, Paul M Grist State Park, Pooles Crossroads, Stanton, Summerfield, Valley Creek Junction, Plantersville, Isabella, Barrett Creek and Dawson Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
